page.title: 15Biography
page.content: The area in the survey has no famous public figures who have any aristocratic background.Neither of the villages in the survey had any manorhouse of known importance.However we are fortunate to have in our community two important local politicians Mr E.White,our county coucillor,and Mr W. Law Croft's parish council chairman and district councillor for Blaby district.We were fortunate to have an interview with Mr Law.He told us of his day at work.He is an official in charge of purchasing equipment for the British Gas Corporation.In fact he is in charge of a budget of 25 million pounds.His headquarters are at Hinckley .This was chosen by British Gas because it is near the centre of England.Mr Law told that he enjoyed his work since it made him think.He also enjoys gardening.
